changeSet.author: anar
changeSet.comment: Populate Post properties needed to avoid sub-queries while fetching records.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE post SET resolved = EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT answer_post.post_id FROM post LEFT OUTER JOIN answer_post ON post.id = answer_post.post_id WHERE answer_post.resolves_post = true GROUP BY answer_post.post_id) AS derived_table WHERE post_id = post.id);

UPDATE post set answer_count = ( SELECT number_of_answers FROM ( SELECT answer_post.post_id, count(answer_post.id) AS number_of_answers FROM post LEFT OUTER JOIN answer_post ON post.id=answer_post.post_id GROUP BY post.id) AS derived_table WHERE post_id = post.id);

UPDATE post set vote_count = ( SELECT number_of_votes FROM ( SELECT post_id, count(reaction.id) AS number_of_votes FROM post LEFT OUTER JOIN reaction ON post.id=reaction.post_id WHERE reaction.emoji_id = 'heavy_plus_sign' GROUP BY post.id) AS derived_table WHERE post_id = post.id);
